titles.title: To return a certain bill to the Senate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 1/4/1996--Introduced. Returns to the Senate S. 1508 (designation of all Federal employees as essential) because, in the opinion of the House of Representatives, the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the bill contravenes the Constitution and infringes on the privileges of the House.
